author: tellison
msg: Fix and regression test for threadLocal vulnerability.  ThreadLocalVariables should
not be asked for their hashCode and equality to prevent spoof implementations.

msg: * Refactored out MPIR dependency in favor of maven-dependency-tree component.

author: joakime
msg: * refactored out Dependency Tree components in favor of MNG-2654 maven-dependency-tree component.
* updated to use new JarAnalyzerFactory mechanism present in maven-shared-jar.

author: hlship
msg: Add events for passivating page state (into render URLs) and activating pages (to restore page state from the context).
